cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Natural Resources on February 16, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 3525, Commission To Study the Potential Creation of a National Museum of Asian Pacific American History and Culture Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 91 (Tuesday, May 25, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. MENG:
H.R. 3525.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 13 of the Constitution
[Page H2668]
title: Commission To Study the Potential Creation of a National Museum of Asian Pacific American History and Culture Act
